sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Router} from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { constructor(private router: Router) { } log() { console.log("Controllo del login..."); this.router.navigate(["\auto"]); console.log("Reindirizzamento alle auto tramite router.navigate..."); } }
